snippet.title: Lost Colony Demo now Live on Steam
snippet.description:
"Lost Colony" is a Twin-Stick Shooter Action-Roguelike set on an abandoned space colony. Guided by your drone companion, you must explore the planet and defend yourself from the swarms of aliens and the corrupted colony security system. Will you uncover the secrets of the Lost Colony?

Play the demo, now on Steam.
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2410440/Lost_Colony/
